contents.name: EnergyArea
contents.description: The energy area that is forecast from this control area specification.

contents.name: netInterchange
contents.description: The specified positive net interchange into the control area, i.e. positive sign means flow in to the area.

contents.name: type
contents.description: The primary type of control area definition used to determine if this is used for automatic generation control, for planning interchange control, or other purposes.   A control area specified with primary type of automatic generation control could still be forecast and used as an interchange area in power flow analysis.

enumValues.name: Interchange
enumValues.description: Used for interchange specification or control.
